contentrichtext.text: {{historical}} These '''orphaned articles''' were detected in the database dump of June 26, 2004. (Some of the orphaned articles that were detected at that time have since been linked from other articles and removed from this list.) It includes articles that are '''not linked from other articles''' in the article [[Wikipedia:namespace|namespace]]. [[Wikipedia:disambiguation|Disambiguation pages]] should already be removed. {{specialpageslist}} These pages can be removed from this list once: *pages have been adopted (by the creation of a link from three or more other articles); *pages have been deleted (links already red or question marked); *pages have been made [[Wikipedia:redirect|redirect]]s; *pages have been marked [[Wikipedia:Disambiguation|disambiguation]] pages, usually with <nowiki>{{</nowiki>[[Template:disambig|disambig]]}} *pages are listed on [[Wikipedia:Duplicate_articles]] and marked as such, or have already been merged (redirected); *[[Wikipedia:Subpages to be moved#temp|temp pages]] have been moved out of the article namespace. After an update, they won't appear here. <br style="clear:both;"/> There is cached version of the initial function at [[Special:Lonelypages]] which includes disambiguation pages and others excluded here. ==How to update== See [[/How to update]] ==Excluded entries== [[Census-designated place]]s, towns and villages, are listed on '''[[/CDPs and towns]]''' ==Main list== {| border="1" cellpadding="2" |'''<nowiki>----</nowiki>''' || '''##''' || '''Last count''' ||'''<nowiki>----</nowiki>''' || '''##''' || '''Last count''' || |- !
